item.title: Guides
item.description: Production Setup on Digital Ocean PHPStorm XDebug Setup Production Setup on Digital Ocean Install Docker Visit DigitalOcean and login. Click the Create Droplet button. Open the One-click apps tab. Select Docker with your preferred version. Continue creating the droplet as you normally would. If needed, check your e-mail for the droplet root password. SSH to your Server Find the IP address of the droplet in the DigitalOcean interface.
